title: BRIEF-Bell Equipment Reports Half-Yearly HEPS Of 164 Cents
text:
BRIEF-Bell Equipment Reports Half-Yearly HEPS Of 164 Cents

Stock Markets 21 minutes ago (Sep 09, 2019 10:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Bell Equipment Reports Half-Yearly HEPS Of 164 Cents Sept 9 (Reuters) - Bell Equipment Ltd : * JSE: BEL - UNAUDITED INTERIM RESULTS FOR THE PERIOD ENDED 30 JUNE 2019 AND CASH DIVIDEND DECLARATION * BELL EQUIPMENT LTD - HY HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE 164 CENTS * BELL EQUIPMENT LTD - HY REVENUE 4.04 BILLION RAND VERSUS 3.73 BILLION RAND * BELL EQUIPMENT LTD - HY EARNINGS PER SHARE 165 CENTS * BELL EQUIPMENT LTD - INTERIM NET DIVIDEND IS 16 CENTS PER SHARE FOR ORDINARY SHAREHOLDERS WHO ARE NOT EXEMPT FROM DIVIDENDS TAX

BRIEF-Bell Equipment Reports Half-Yearly HEPS Of 164 Cents
